content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana slovenia the case is about costs and started on october 19 2022 it is expected to conclude on july 14 2023 lasting 8 months and 25 days the final resolution involves dividing goods between two exspouses with a total value of 24900000 eur the plaintiff is responsible for collecting payment from the defendant who is required to pay 5000000 eur to the plaintiff the decision in this case is based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the court settlement is confidential so the details cannot be disclosed there is no translation available for this document
